attributes.action: Use buses/coaches for certain schools, colleges and universities.
attributes.additional_details: So adults,/commuters can still get on buses without having to wait when schools reopen. Allowing more adults to travel to work when needed.
attributes.background: Use buses/coaches for every school , colleges and universities so commuters do not have to wait extra time just to get on buses, when schools reopen. Use these buses and coaches so every school, college and university’s stick together , and adults that go to work on buses can still do so.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In any case, local transport is usually a matter for local authorities (councils) and not the UK Government or Parliament.
